tool_description: Performs market basket analysis to identify frequently bought together items and association rules for cross-selling opportunities.

transaction_data_source.description: Data source identifier for transaction analysis

min_support.description: Minimum support threshold for association rules (0.01-0.5)

min_confidence.description: Minimum confidence threshold for association rules (0.1-1.0)

analysis_timeframe_days.description: Number of days of transaction data to analyze (30-365)

category_filter.description: Specific product categories to include in analysis

error_messages: Invalid data source: The specified transaction_data_source is not accessible.
Invalid support threshold: min_support must be between 0.01 and 0.5.
Invalid confidence threshold: min_confidence must be between 0.1 and 1.0.
Invalid timeframe: analysis_timeframe_days must be between 30 and 365.
Insufficient transaction data: Not enough transactions found for reliable analysis.
usage: Provide transaction_data_source and optionally set thresholds and filters to identify product associations and cross-selling opportunities.

association_rules.description: Association rules with support and confidence metrics
